item.description: Hello all....this is the biggest Diwali celebration in New Englang...here are details. DIWALI DHAMAKA Come for a magical night filled with lights, great food and the joy of Diwali Sing along to live music and dance to the beat of Bollywood songs by Din Check $40 per adult, $25 per child - includes appetizers, buffet dinner + fresh mithai station Drinks: Cash Bar Tickets must be purchased by October 26...Call 508-498-1351! For more information please visit https://www.facebook.... Please spread the word and bring your friends!
item.name: "Diwali Dhamaka" Celebration - Live Bollywood band, DJ, lavish food!
